${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:FlyingKick.NAME: FlyingKick
${modID}:FlyingKick.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Cripple. NL Deal !D! damage, gain !M! energy. Suffer !${modID}:debuffAmount! frail next turn.

${modID}:FalconPunch.NAME: FalconPunch
${modID}:FalconPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal 14 damage. Next attack deals !${modID}:raptorDamage! extra damage. Also applies !M! weak and !M! vulnerable.

${modID}:Mobbing.NAME: Mobbing
${modID}:Mobbing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each attack in your draw pile.

${modID}:MercyKilling.NAME: Mercy Killing
${modID}:MercyKilling.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, draw a card for each target debuff.

${modID}:BirdStrike.NAME: Bird Strike
${modID}:BirdStrike.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Crippled NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Loose !M! Dexterity next turn.

${modID}:Spite.NAME: Spite
${modID}:Spite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have a debuff, deal that again.

${modID}:Dive.NAME: Dive
${modID}:Dive.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, deals !M! extra damage for ALL your Dive cards.

${modID}:DeathPlunge.NAME: Death Plunge
${modID}:DeathPlunge.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Crippled NL Deal !D! damage. Take !M! damage next turn.

${modID}:Raking.NAME: Raking
${modID}:Raking.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage. Gain energy for each enemy hit.

${modID}:Stalk.NAME: Stalk
${modID}:Stalk.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw !M! zero cost attacks.

${modID}:Strafe.NAME: Strafe
${modID}:Strafe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !${modID}:realDamage! damage. Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:Crashout.NAME: Crashout
${modID}:Crashout.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Duplicate this card X times.

${modID}:EagleEyed.NAME: Eagle Eyed
${modID}:EagleEyed.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Add a ${modID}:Duplicate into your draw pile.
${modID}:EagleEyed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Add 2 ${modID}:Duplicates into your draw pile.

${modID}:Duck.NAME: Duck
${modID}:Duck.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Reduce the cost of a card in your hand to 0.

${modID}:Swoop.NAME: Swoop
${modID}:Swoop.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Gain !M! energy, next turn draw 1 less card.

${modID}:Spearwall.NAME: Spearwall
${modID}:Spearwall.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Gain !B! block for each attack card drawn.

${modID}:Skyward.NAME: Skyward
${modID}:Skyward.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block this turn. Gain 1 frail next turn.

${modID}:Probiotics.NAME: Probiotics
${modID}:Probiotics.DESCRIPTION: Increase target buff and debuff by !M!.

${modID}:IronWingTechnique.NAME: IronWingTechnique
${modID}:IronWingTechnique.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Next turn gain !M! random debuffs.

${modID}:BCells.NAME: B Cells
${modID}:BCells.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each power a target has.

${modID}:WingAndBlade.NAME: Wing And Blade
${modID}:WingAndBlade.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Draw !M! zero cost attacks.

${modID}:FeatherForm.NAME: Feather Form
${modID}:FeatherForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, reduce the cost of a random card to 0 until played.
${modID}:FeatherForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, reduce the cost of a random card to 0 for this combat.

${modID}:Symbiosis.NAME: Symbiosis
${modID}:Symbiosis.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! debuff you gain apply to enemy instead.

${modID}:Aerodynamic.NAME: Aerodynamic
${modID}:Aerodynamic.DESCRIPTION: First attack played on a turn, plays a copy of that attack in your draw pile.
${modID}:Aerodynamic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: First attack played on a turn, plays !M! copies of that attack in your draw pile.

${modID}:Acclimatize.NAME: Acclimatize
${modID}:Acclimatize.DESCRIPTION: Gaining a debuff draws a card.

${modID}:BirdOfPrey.NAME: Bird Of Prey
${modID}:BirdOfPrey.DESCRIPTION: At start of each turn, ${modID}:Duplicate a card in your hand.
${modID}:BirdOfPrey.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At start of each turn, ${modID}:Duplicate !M! cards in your hand.

${modID}:Moulting.NAME: Moulting
${modID}:Moulting.DESCRIPTION: Each turn add a random debuff to all enemies.

${modID}:LighterThanAir.NAME: Lighter Than Air
${modID}:LighterThanAir.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to all enemies if you end a turn on an empty hand.

${modID}:Homeostasis.NAME: Homeostasis
${modID}:Homeostasis.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, increase all powers by 1 stack.

${modID}:CombatReady.NAME: Combat Ready
${modID}:CombatReady.DESCRIPTION: At the start if your turn add a random attack to your hand.
${modID}:CombatReady.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start if your turn add a random attack to your hand.

${modID}:TaintedBlade.NAME: Tainted Blade
${modID}:TaintedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage and apply equal amount of virus.

${modID}:Mimicry.NAME: Mimicry
${modID}:Mimicry.DESCRIPTION: Copy the last attack inflicted to you.

${modID}:Gyroscopic.NAME: Gyroscopic
${modID}:Gyroscopic.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! cards played draw a card.

${modID}:Quarantine.NAME: Quarantine
${modID}:Quarantine.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${modID}:Disease to all enemies. Double all enemies disease.

${modID}:FreeAsABird.NAME: FreeAsABird
${modID}:FreeAsABird.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Duplicate all cards in your draw pile.

${modID}:Contagion.NAME: Contagion
${modID}:Contagion.DESCRIPTION: Apply all your debuffs to target.
${modID}:Contagion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply all your debuffs to all enemies.
